MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele affecting a number of properties in the local area. This is causing flickering supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:39pm.Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1:40pm on the 29th October 2020.
